## Source: ossf-package-analysis (d273d8be87dc1aaa71222024d9f545d4ec9bde08234f27b0c9c81f6dd8c86721)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'redux-probe-unknown-action-rce' @ 1.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
